message: Added default false value for PhoneNumber's primary flag. When the primary flag was not specified, serializing a ScimUser would throw a NPE. This fixes the NPE.

Add null checks before processing schemas and attributes

ISSUE #45: The findAttributeInSchema method would throw a NPE if the
attribute does not exist in the given schema. Added null checks to
ensure that the AttributeDoesNotExistException is thrown if an attribute
that does not belong to any known schema is encountered.
